1.content:
You are relaxing in your bedroom, it's the early afternoon of Friday, and earlier in the morning, your parents had left for a weekend trip to a small resort a few hours away, and had left the emergency contact numbers on the table. You had been left in charge, since you were a year old than your sister, and when your sister, Vanessa, had come ot ask you if she could have a few friends over for the weekend for a slumber party, you agreed, as long as you were disturbed too much. Gleefully, your sister ran to make the phone calls to get the event organized. You told hershe could have the living room, as that was where the good TV and stuff was. You knew you'd be fine in your room, and you may as well let them have their fun.

Later your sister had gone into her room to get ready for the party, and you made your way to the kitchen, to grab yourself some food and other things before everyone got there. As you walked into the kitchen, a weird, tingling sensation came over you, and you collapsed, blacking out in the process.

When you awoke a few minutes later, you began to freak out, as everything around you, the fridge, the stove, was huge! After a few seconds of shock, you realized that you had gotten smaller, and everything else was normal! You managed to calm down enough to move out of the middle of the kitchen and to the side, out of the way, as you began to formulize a plan. You needed to get your sisters attention, so you'd at least be safe, and could begin to try to discover what caused this to happen. But with a small gasp, you realized that your sisters friends were due to arrive any minute now. Just as you thought of this, the doorbell rang, and her three friends, Claire, Ashley and Joy let themselves in, carrying sleeping bags, and overnight bags with new clothes and stuff inside. Your sister ran into view and hugged each of her friends, and they moved into the living room to get set up. You decide to. . . . .
1.title: The Shrinking and the Arrival

The girls pop in a DVD, and Joy and Ashley sit on the couch, while your sister and Claire lay down on their sleeping bags on the floor. Your sister has her socks on, while everyone else is barefoot. You wonder if tickling one of their feet would be a good way to get their attention, or if you should even try to make a move. Or you could go to the far side of the room, where the girls laid their clothes down, and you could hide in an article of clothling,to rest and get noticed later.

You. . . .

You move towards the running shoes, and grab a lace that is hanging to the floor, and you climb up, your athletic frame having little trouble doing so. When you get on top of the shoe, you stand over the opening, and inhale deeply, as a sweaty, musky odor fills oyur nostrils. You sigh happily, but you then lose your balance, and tumble into the shoe! You land hard on the sole of the shoe, which is damp from your sisters run yesterday. The smell has intensified, and despite your fetish, it's actually TOO strong now. Try as you may, you cannot climb back out of the shoe, as you can't get a grip anywhere. You curse yourself for your stupidity, as you don't know when your sister will use these shoes again. She could run to the store today, tomorrow, or not use them till after the weekend is over. Resigning yourself to the situation, you start walking towards the toe section of the shoe, causing the smell to intensify, but then you hear your sister walking into the room.

Is she in here for something els,e or is she getting her shoes?

info.brief_description: You shrink during your sisters slumber party!
info.description:
You are 18 year old Jeff Long, and it's Friday afternoon. Your parents went away for the weekend, and your sister, Vanessa decides to have a slumber party, while you plan to enjoy a relaxing weekend to yourself. However, things go awry when you shrink in the kitchen. It's almost time for your sisters friends to arrive, what ill you do?

Rules:

I'm good with most additions, as long as there is no furries or really bad one sentence chapters. Please post something good, at least a small paragraph, and try to have good spelling and grammar. Killing off Jeff is iffy, I'll allow it, but only if the arc has been going for a while, otherwise, don't do it.
You shrink to about half an inch tall.

Characters:

You, Jeff Long: 18, short brown hair, and tall, athletic build.

Sister, Vanessa Long. 17, also athletic build. Long, black hair, Nice feet, and a perfect size butt, but small breasts. You two are actually very close, so if she were to find you, she wouldn't be evil. But she may play around a bit. You've often complained about her smelly feet.

Claire. 16, shorter, but not overweight, blond hair, has always had a small crush on you.

Joy. 17, Average height, brunette. You've always had a crush on her, because she is very crazy and kinky, and willing to do about anything.

Ashley. 17, blond, slightly gothish. She has never liked you much, and would probably have a lot of fun if she found you.
